attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 11
attributes.caption: "Smells like somebody wrapped a steak in a garbage bag."
attributes.description: In which our heroes rejoin the fight, new paths are laid bare, Mirri gains some odd abilities, and Shattercock loses her top.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 12
attributes.caption: "Those were some huge... attacks... Shattercock."
attributes.description: In which... well, in which our heroes fight a pretty damn intimidating giant red gorilla. Plus, Shattercock is still super topless.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 13
attributes.caption: "I actually had to pee, I wasn't masturbating."
attributes.description: Prepare yourselves for the most HUMERUS episode of Twits & Crits to date! ... In which our adventurers encounter undead foe and stumble upon an ancient cryptograph.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 14
attributes.caption: "Let us go forth with reckless abandon."
attributes.description: In which faces are removed, confounding puzzles are solved, fantasies are explored, and, sadly, Shattercock finds cover for her bosom.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 15
attributes.caption: "We asked about the harvest, not the... 'Whore-vest'."
attributes.description: A giant, fleshy monstrosity appears.... and no, it's not Shattercock! Geez. Plus, Dirick gets in touch with his avian side.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 16
attributes.caption: "I'm going in, Shattercock. Deeper than ever."
attributes.description: In which our adventurers encounter the darkest magic they've ever seen, and Mr. Skittles acts like a total dick.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 17
attributes.caption: "If you panic you're going in the meat hut."
attributes.description: In which our adventurers return to the village of Jai-Yen and find themselves consumed by the holiday spirit. Decker and Racsan have a little shvitz, and Shattercock and Dirik eat some dope-ass muffins.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 18
attributes.caption: "Man, that's a lot of ass damage."
attributes.description: In which our adventurers battle an evil demon reverse Santa Claus, Myri strikes out, Grimo and Dirik team up, and Racsan finds his mojo.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 19
attributes.caption: "This old lady makes sex clothes?"
attributes.description: In which our adventurers embark on a journey to the citadel to claim their reward, and Grimo makes a horse friend.

attributes.title: Funhaus Dungeons and Dragons - Episode 20
attributes.caption: "Send the negotiating horse!"
attributes.description: In which our adventurers prepare to meet their uncertain future, head on. And Chauncey takes a dump.
